config.sidebarPosition.caption.message: Style of contents for the sidebar position

config.insertNewChildAt.caption.message: Insertion position of new child tabs

config.insertNewChildAt.noControl.message: No control (respect the decision by Firefox or other tab addons)

config.insertNewChildAt.first.message: Insert to the top of the tree, as the first child

config.insertNewChildAt.last.message: Append to the last of the tree

config.autoCollapseExpandSubtreeOnAttach.message: When a new tree appears, collapse others automatically

config.autoCollapseExpandSubtreeOnSelect.message: When a tab gets focus, expand its tree and collapse others automatically
Except focus moving caused by current tab closing

config.autoExpandOnAttached.label.message: Expand tree automatically, when tabs are inserted into the tree

config.closeParentBehavior.caption.message: When a parent tab is closed

config.closeParentBehavior.replaceWithGr.message: Replace closed parent with a dummy tab and keep the tree

config.closeParentBehavior.promoteFirst.message: Promote the first child tab as the new parent

config.closeParentBehavior.promoteAll.message: Promote all child tabs as the level of the closed parent tab

config.promoteFirstChildForClosedRoot.la.message: Promote the first child tab as the new parent, if the closed parent has no parent

config.closeParentBehavior.detach.message: Liberate child tabs from the tree

config.userStyleRules.label.message: Extra style rules for sidebar contents

config.acccelaratedTabDuplication.label.message: Accelarate operations around tab duplication (*NOTE: You'll see unstable behavior around tabs.)

config.maximumAcceptableDelayForTabDupli.message: Abort tab duplication when it takes
